topic.title: Microsoft SQL Server's XML Schema Repository Level

body.p: The contextual menu of a XML Schema Repository node in the tree from the Data Source Explorer view contains the following actions:

dlentry.dd: Performs a refresh for the sub-tree of the selected node.

Opens a dialog for adding a new schema file in the DB XML repository. In this dialog you enter a collection name and the necessary schema files. XML Schema files management is done by using the Add and Remove buttons.

body.p: The actions available at Schema level are as follows:

dlentry.dd: Performs a refresh of the selected node (and its sub-tree).
Adds a new schema to the XML Schema files.
Removes the selected schema from the XML Schema Repository.
